title: Process a Direct Store Delivery (DSD)
description: A vendor (e.g., a soda bottler) arrives to deliver products directly to the store, bypassing the warehouse.

tasks.description: The vendor provides an invoice for the products they are delivering.
tasks.expected_outcome: The store associate receives the delivery paperwork.

tasks.description: The associate counts the items being delivered and verifies that the quantities match the invoice.
tasks.expected_outcome: The delivery is confirmed to be accurate.

tasks.description: The associate signs the invoice and uses the DSD function in the inventory system to add the items directly into the store's inventory.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inventory is updated accurately for the items that did not come from the main warehouse.
